name: This Is MY House!
description:
A simple game I made entirely in one afternoon. I was bored and felt distracted from my bigger projects. I decided to take a break from them and make something simpler. I was going to make power ups and upgrades, but got bored. Maybe I'll make some in the future.

Credits:

The song in-game is a remix of Gnossienne, by Ozsut.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1r0e3ebjtDY
